1.Title: Rapid Heat
1.Description: When Soldier 11 enters combat or switches in, if her Energy is less than 40, her Energy is recovered to 80. This effect can trigger once every 50s.
1.Lore:
Long-term high-intensity combat training allows Soldier 11 to complete mastery of her regulatory systems.
She will always strive to ensure that she's in the best shape for each and every battle.

2.Title: Scorching Convergence
2.Description: When triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, and <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> DMG increases by 3%, up to 12 stacks, lasting 15s, with the duration of each stack calculated separately.
2.Lore:
"She may look cold and hard, like a big ice cube... But actually, she's scalding hot inside, like a blazing fire."
â€” From an anonymous soldier of the Obsidian Division

3.Title: Elite Soldier
3.Lore: Soldier 11 always expects the most from herself, no matter if it's in training or physical combat. That is how she maintains her combat prowess.

4.Title: Indulgent Blaze
4.Description:
If <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> is triggered during the 1st, 2nd, or 3rd hit of Soldier 11's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or a <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, Anti-Interrupt Level increases and DMG received is reduced by 18% during skill activation.
If <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> is triggered during the 4th hit of her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, she becomes invulnerable during skill activation.
4.Lore: She envies fire. And these smoldering flames will always help her.

5.Title: Perfect Soldier
5.Lore: The road from elite to exemplar is long and difficult, but Soldier 11 grits her teeth and perseveres, as if there's something pushing her towards the goal of becoming a perfect soldier...

6.Title: Scorching Flow
6.Description:
When Soldier 11 uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, she gains 8 stacks of Charge (max 8 stacks).
When <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> is triggered, 1 stack of Charge is consumed, causing the current move to ignore 25% of the target's <color=#FF5521>Fire RES</color>.
6.Lore: The flames of the sword distorted the air with their heat. Her movements grew ever more impassioned, as if that heat seeped into her spirit with every breath, igniting her thoughts.

DescriptionByLevel.1: When triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, increase that attack's DMG by <color=#2BAD00>35%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.2: When triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, increase that attack's DMG by <color=#2BAD00>40.8%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.3: When triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, increase that attack's DMG by <color=#2BAD00>46.6%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.4: When triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, increase that attack's DMG by <color=#2BAD00>52.5%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.5: When triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, increase that attack's DMG by <color=#2BAD00>58.3%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.6: When triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, increase that attack's DMG by <color=#2BAD00>64.1%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.7: When triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, increase that attack's DMG by <color=#2BAD00>70%</color>.

MathSkill.Title: Additional Ability: Fields of Fire
MathSkill.Description:
When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Soldier 11 deals 10% more <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. When attacking Stunned enemies, this effect is further enhanced by an additional 22.5%.

104100001.Title: Basic Attack: Warmup Sparks
104100001.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 4 slashes, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

104100002.Title: Basic Attack: Fire Suppression
104100002.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> at the right moment to activate:
Unleashes a set of more powerful slashes, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.

104100003.Title: Special Attack: Raging Fire
104100003.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Slashes enemies nearby, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

104100004.Title: EX Special Attack: Fervent Fire
104100004.Description:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Slashes enemies nearby, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, Soldier 11's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</color> will trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> for up to 15s or 8 times.

104100005.Title: Dodge: Tempered Fire
104100005.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

104100006.Title: Dash Attack: Blazing Fire
104100006.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

104100007.Title: Dash Attack: Fire Suppression
104100007.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.

104100008.Title: Dodge Counter: Backdraft
104100008.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Executes a powerful slash against enemies in front, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

104100009.Title: Chain Attack: Uplifting Flame
104100009.Description:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful upward slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, Soldier 11's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</color> trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> for the next 15s, up to 8 times.

104100010.Title: Ultimate: Bellowing Flame
104100010.Description:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes a powerful upward slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, Soldier 11's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</color> trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> for the next 15s, up to 8 times.

104100012.Title: Quick Assist: Covering Fire
104100012.Description:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

104100013.Title: Defensive Assist: Hold the Line
104100013.Description:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

104100014.Title: Assist Follow-Up: Reignition
104100014.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Charge and cross slash enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
